trends: There have been 12 other sightings in New Braunfels
There were no other sightings in New Braunfels on or around November 7th 2012
Summary: multiple white lights(paired) in triangular shape. Low pulsating red light (center back)
divs: Sighting DetailsWas picking up grand daughter from 4h and while driving home was viewing bright stars in the sky. Realized that one of them was a commercial jet (flight path to San Antonio). As I was continuing to drive I kept observing the stars and realized that one had a cluster of paired lights within a triangular shape. It was moving slowly from east to west. I was dring in opposite direction of the object. I first thought it was man made, but the triangle shape had me questioning that.
